name: Yogo - Ninja Adventure
description:
Yogo - Ninja Adventure

Story

Yogo - Ninja Adventure is a adventure and exploration game.
Where a Ninja was summoned by the emperor to save an important document in a temple on a zombie-infested island.

Controls

WASD to Move

8 or Arrow Up - Jump

5 or Arrow Down -  Attack

Leave your comments about improvements and updates for the game :)
